name: Bobby Grim
introduction: Robert "Bobby" Grim (born 4 September 1924 and died 14 June 1995) was an American racing driver who participated in the USAC Championship Car series from 1958 to 1969. During his career, his entries into the 1959 Indianapolis 500 and 1960 Indianapolis 500 were counted towards the Formula One championship, although he scored no championship points.
